# UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle

**Structure**

A window toolbar style which displays its toolbar and title bar inline.

## Declaration

```swift
struct UnifiedWindowToolbarStyle
```

## Overview

You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified] or [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified(showsTitle:)] to construct this style.

## Creating the window toolbar style

- **init()**: Creates a unified window toolbar style.
- **init(showsTitle:)**: Creates a unified window toolbar style.

## Supporting types

- **DefaultWindowToolbarStyle**: The default window toolbar style.
- **ExpandedWindowToolbarStyle**: A window toolbar style which displays its title bar area above the toolbar.
- **UnifiedCompactWindowToolbarStyle**: A window toolbar style similar to [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/WindowToolbarStyle/unified], but with a more compact vertical sizing.

## Conforms To

- WindowToolbarStyle
